text: aye Nabi!(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) (apni ummath se kaho ke) jab tum apni biwiyo ko talaaq dena chaaho to un ki iddath (ke dino ke aghaaz) mein unhe talaaq do aur iddath ka hisaab rakho aur Allah se jo tumhaara parvardigaar hai darte raho, na tum unhe un ke gharo se nikaalo aur na wo (khud) nikle, haan ye aur baath hai ke wo khuli buraayi kar baithe, ye Allah ki muqarrar karda hadein hai, jo shaqs Allah ki hado se aage bad jaaye, us ne yaqinan apne upar zulm kiya, tum nahi jaante shaayad us ke baadh Allah taâ€™ala koyi nayi baath payda karde
